title: Pomyo
challenge: Building a simple yet effective timer with real-time updates and a smooth user experience across devices.
description: A sleek and user-friendly Pomodoro timer app designed to boost focus and productivity with customizable work and break intervals.
outcome: Helped users improve work sessions and maintain focus by providing a reliable and attractive Pomodoro timer.
short_description: Customizable Pomodoro timer for better focus and productivity
solution: Implemented precise timer logic with React hooks and state management, along with an intuitive UI for easy customization.
